quagga.input.subject: FW: Vitro
quagga.input.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: 	Miller, Don (Asset Mktg)  
Sent:	Wednesday, September 26, 2001 11:43 AM
To:	Kitchen, Louise
Subject:	Vitro

Louise,

There is no way that Vitro will close this quarter.  Give me a call and I will fill in all the facts.

Don
